column2: I can see. I sense that you were unable to reach a peaceful solution.
You're right. How did you know?
In the end, that thing put on a scary show, the same way it did before. I can't say I'll forget it anytime soon.
Martan, I was in a hurry. Besides, are people really panicking that much?
Not that much. But still, you could have tried to come up with something more subtle.
Maybe I could have, maybe not, what does it matter now? Okay. I have to go.
